user.title: Enter Additional Information
user.pageInfo: Entering additional information allows you to use VIRNECT products to be more utilizable

profileImage.title: Profile Image
profileImage.subTitle: Register your profile image
profileImage.contents: Your profile image is shared to other members
profileImage.visible: Your profile image is shared to all the members using VIRNECT product users
profileImage.limit: Up to 5Mb of Jpg or Png files can be uploaded

nickName.title: Nickname
nickName.contents: Please enter 20 characters or less. You can use Korean English special characters (excluding (<) (>)) and spaces.

recoveryInfo.title: Enter account recovery information
recoveryInfo.placeHolder: In case you forget account information please enter the verification information.

etc.title: Error
etc.message: Failed to proceed with account registration please try again later

nickName.title: Nickname setup error
nickName.message: Please enter a nickname of 20 characters or less. You can use Korean English special characters and spaces.
